amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute allows the Wolf Trap Farm Park for the Performing Arts in Virginia to be known as the "Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts".
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Radanovich.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Radanovich amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
